0110000001111011 0011010010111111 0 -> sum: 1001010100111010, cout: 0
1000010011101101 0110010010110101 1 -> sum: 1110100110100011, cout: 0
1101100011000001 1111110000011110 1 -> sum: 1101010011100000, cout: 1

1111111111111111 1111111111111111 1 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 1
0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
